Package main.java.neat.core

Class Agent

java.lang.Object
main.java.neat.core.Agent
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class Agent
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
Represents an individual agent in the NEAT (NeuroEvolution of Augmenting Topologies) algorithm. Each agent contains a neural network genome that can be evolved, and maintains fitness information used during the evolutionary process.
Author:
Taher Joudeh
See Also:
Serialized Form

    • getGenome

      public Genome getGenome()
      Gets the agent's neural network genome.
      Returns:
      The agent's genome.

    • setGenome

      public void setGenome​(Genome genome)
      Replaces the agent's current genome with a new one.
      Parameters:
      genome - The new genome to assign.

    • getSpeciesNumber

      public int getSpeciesNumber()
      Gets the species identifier for this agent.
      Returns:
      The species number this agent belongs to.

    • getFitness

      public double getFitness()
      Gets the raw fitness score for this agent.
      Returns:
      The agent's current fitness value.

    • setFitness

      public void setFitness​(double fitness)
      Sets the raw fitness score for this agent.
      Parameters:
      fitness - The fitness value to assign.

    • think

      public double[] think​(double[] input)
      Processes input values through the agent's neural network.
      Parameters:
      input - Array of input values for the neural network.
      Returns:
      Array of output values from the neural network.

    • decide

      public boolean[] decide​(double[] input)
      Processes input values and returns thresholded boolean decisions. Output values that hit the activation threshold are considered true, others false.
      Parameters:
      input - Array of input values for the neural network.
      Returns:
      Array of boolean decisions based on network outputs.
